attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To make sure everyone pays a equal percentage of tax If the low paid can pay tax on their gross wage/salary then why can't everyone else?.
Legislation should be brought in to ensure that they do.

rejection.details: The title of a petition must be a call for action, not your names. '..petition the Prime Minister to T Balmforth, J Balmforth' does not make sense.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
